mapper.select: WITH roleIdWithPerms AS ( SELECT rm.role_id, m.perms FROM sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE m.is_deleted = 0 AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != '' ) SELECT DISTINCT rp.perms FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roleIdWithPerms rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.id = #{userId}
